summary:
Dinokaar (Dovah for Lich):
A dracolich companion who lives near Swindler\'s Den
descriptionHtml:
DINOKAAR V2

Dinokaar (Dovah for Lich):
A dracolich companion who lives near Swindler\'s Den

By Zyris
September 14, 2013
============
It has long been rumored that a dark force waits to be summoned. A force locked away in an 
ancient amulet. And whoever wears the amulet becomes one with the dead.
============
NOTE: This file replaces Dinokaar v1 which is no longer available.
The changes made are:

01) Removed the Draugr Eyes effect applied while wearing the amulet.
02) Corrected typos related to the quest.
03) Enhanced the skeleton’s combat style.
04) Modified the skeleton’s Drain Life spell.
05) Corrected the dragon’s name.

I do not recommend using both version 1 and version 2 of this mod should you have both. You will have conflicts.
============
This mod consists of a dragon companion with many abilities. The dragon will aid in combat 
only if the player is wearing the assigned amulet.
To start this mod simply install the files into your DATA folder and wait for a courier to 
deliver a note. This will begin a short and easy quest.
============
INSTALLATION:

Place both the .esp and .bsa folders into you DATA folder.

Windows 7 path:
My computer / Local Disk (c:) / Program Files / Steam / Steamapps / Common / Skyrim / Data
============
THINGS TO KNOW:

01) While both skeletons have a DRAIN LIFE ability they rarely use it.
02) Both skeletons and the dragon have a RAISE ZOMBIE ability. The dragon will rarely use 
    this in cities, and seems to cast this more in the open world.
03) Wearing the amulet applies the Lich Effect.
============
DRAGON ABILITIES:

01)  Summon Skeleton Shout
02)  Chaurus Poison Bite
       - Leveled
03)  Dragon Unarmed Damage
       - Leveled
04)  Dragon Fireball Shout (damage to health and stamina)
     - Leveled
05)  Frost Breath Shout
     - Leveled
06) Unrelenting Force Shout
    - Staggers targets and knocks over loose objects.
07) crDragon Tail
    - Stagger area attack
08) crDragon Resist NPCs
    - Negate 50% of incoming damage, except from the Dragonborn.
09) Resistance to damage, frost, fire, shock, disease, poison
    - Leveled
10) Raise Zombie Shout
11) Lich Effect: Dark purple haze surrounding the body

============
SKELETON ABILITIES:

01) Drain Life (damage to health, stamina and magicka)
    - Leveled
02) Summon Skeleton
03) Raise Zombie
04) Unrelenting Force
05) Lich Effect: Dark purple haze surrounding the body

Note: This main skeleton has the ability to summon a second skeleton. The second skeleton is a
         clone to the first but does not have a summon ability.

============
SKELETON PERKS:

01) Paralyzing Strike
02) Critical Charge
03) Savage Strike
04) Fighting Stance
05) Armsman 00
06) Quick Shot
07) Power Shot
08) Eagle Eye 30
09) Overdraw 00
